professions.name: Healthcare and Medical
professions.description: Professions focused on the diagnosis, treatment, and prevention of illness and injury.

professions.name: Education and Training
professions.description: Professions dedicated to teaching and training individuals across various levels and disciplines.

professions.name: Engineering and Architecture
professions.description: Professions that involve the design, construction, and maintenance of infrastructure and systems.

professions.name: Information Technology
professions.description: Professions related to the development, implementation, and management of computer-based information systems.

professions.name: Finance and Accounting
professions.description: Professions involved in managing financial records, investments, and economic strategies.

professions.name: Law and Legal Services
professions.description: Professions that provide legal advice, representation, and support in various legal matters.

professions.name: Creative Arts and Design
professions.description: Professions that involve creating visual, auditory, and performance art.

professions.name: Business and Management
professions.description: Professions related to the organization, administration, and operation of businesses.

professions.name: Science and Research
professions.description: Professions dedicated to conducting experiments, research, and analysis to expand knowledge in various fields.

professions.name: Construction and Skilled Trades
professions.description: Professions that involve building, repairing, and maintaining physical structures and systems.

professions.name: Public Services and Administration
professions.description: Professions focused on providing services to the public and managing governmental functions.

professions.name: Transportation and Logistics
professions.description: Professions related to the movement of people and goods.

professions.name: Hospitality and Tourism
professions.description: Professions that cater to the needs of travelers and guests, providing services and experiences.

professions.name: Media and Communications
professions.description: Professions that involve creating and distributing information and entertainment through various media.

professions.name: Agriculture and Environmental Services
professions.description: Professions that involve farming, managing natural resources, and promoting environmental sustainability.
